data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salgado-Barragán, José, Ayón-Parente, Manuel, Hendrickx, Michel E. (2014): A new species of Leptalpheus Williams, 1965 and new records of L. mexicanus Ríos & Carvacho, 1983 and L. hendrickxi Anker, 2011 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from the Pacific coast of Mexico. Zootaxa 3835 (4): 573-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.4.8
